  • Method Details

    • build

      public void build​(Tile builtTile)
      Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToBuild.
      Specified by:
      build in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      build in class Card
      Parameters:
      builtTile -

    • useGodPower

      public void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
      This method overrides Card#useGodPower Hephaestus godpower allows him to build the same tiles twice (but not a dome). If the godpower is used, we build again and start turn-change routine. Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower. The specific actions done vary from card to card. Not all cards actually use this method.
      Specified by:
      useGodPower in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      useGodPower in class Card
      Parameters:
      isUsed - Current player's choice of using the relative godpower

    • setTurnPhase

      protected void setTurnPhase()
      This method overrides Card#setTurnPhase Computes and sets the next turn phase. This is called at the end of every phase-specific method. -> GODPOWER -> end if the player can use Hephaestus's godpower WORKERSELECTION -> MOVE -> BUILD - -> end if the player can't use Hephaestus's godpower
      Overrides:
      setTurnPhase in class Card
